name: LivingEntityHelper
description: Represents a living entity in the world such as mobs, players, and animals.
overview:
LivingEntityHelper provides access to health, status effects, equipment, and other properties specific to living entities. Instances are typically obtained from entity events, player methods, or by accessing nearby entities.

This class extends `EntityHelper` and inherits all methods for position, movement, and general entity properties.

methods.name: getStatusEffects
methods.description: Returns a list of status effects currently applied to the entity.

methods.name: canHaveStatusEffect
methods.description: Checks if the entity can have the specified status effect applied.

methods.name: hasStatusEffect
methods.description: Checks if the entity currently has the status effect with the specified ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the status effect.

methods.name: isHolding
methods.description: Checks if the entity is holding the specified item.

methods.name: getMainHand
methods.description: Gets the item currently held in the entity's main hand.

methods.name: getOffHand
methods.description: Gets the item currently held in the entity's off hand.

methods.name: getHeadArmor
methods.description: Gets the item currently equipped in the head armor slot.

methods.name: getChestArmor
methods.description: Gets the item currently equipped in the chest armor slot.
examples:
// From Equipment Analysis
{ slot: "Chest", item: livingEntity.getChestArmor() }

methods.name: getLegArmor
methods.description: Gets the item currently equipped in the leg armor slot.
examples:
// From Equipment Analysis
{ slot: "Legs", item: livingEntity.getLegArmor() }

methods.name: getFootArmor
methods.description: Gets the item currently equipped in the foot armor slot.
examples:
// From Equipment Analysis
{ slot: "Feet", item: livingEntity.getFootArmor() }

methods.name: getHealth
methods.description: Gets the current health of the entity.

methods.name: getMaxHealth
methods.description: Gets the maximum health of the entity.
examples:
// From Health Monitoring
const maxHealth = livingEntity.getMaxHealth();

methods.name: getAbsorptionHealth
methods.description: Gets the absorption health (yellow hearts) of the entity.

methods.name: getArmor
methods.description: Gets the total armor value of the entity.

methods.name: getDefaultHealth
methods.description: Gets the default maximum health for this type of entity.

methods.name: getMobTags
methods.description: Gets a list of tags associated with the entity.

methods.name: isSleeping
methods.description: Checks if the entity is currently sleeping.
examples:
// From Entity Classification
if (livingEntity.isSleeping()) status.push("Sleeping");

methods.name: isFallFlying
methods.description: Checks if the entity is flying with Elytra.

methods.name: isOnGround
methods.description: Checks if the entity is touching the ground.
examples:
// From Entity Classification
if (!livingEntity.isOnGround()) status.push("In Air");

methods.name: canBreatheInWater
methods.description: Checks if the entity can breathe underwater.

methods.name: hasNoDrag
methods.description: Checks if the entity is unaffected by drag.

methods.name: hasNoGravity
methods.description: Checks if the entity is unaffected by gravity.

methods.name: canTarget
methods.description: Checks if this entity is capable of targeting the specified entity.

parameters.name: target
parameters.description: The entity to test targeting against.

methods.name: canTakeDamage
methods.description: Checks if the entity can take damage.
examples:
// From Entity Classification
if (!livingEntity.canTakeDamage()) status.push("Invulnerable");

methods.name: isPartOfGame
methods.description: Checks if the entity is considered part of the game world logic.

methods.name: isSpectator
methods.description: Checks if the entity is in spectator mode.

methods.name: isUndead
methods.description: Checks if the entity is classified as undead.

methods.name: getBowPullProgress
methods.description: Gets the progress of the entity's bow pull (0.0 to 1.0).

methods.name: getItemUseTimeLeft
methods.description: Gets the remaining time in ticks for the current item being used.

methods.name: isBaby
methods.description: Checks if the entity is a baby variant.

methods.name: canSeeEntity
methods.description: Checks if the entity has line of sight to another entity.

parameters.name: entity
parameters.description: The entity to check visibility for.

parameters.name: simpleCast
parameters.description: Optional. Whether to use a simple raycast check (default false).
